name: Baked lemon-herb chicken with quinoa and broccoli
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season chicken breasts with lemon juice and herbs.
Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Steam broccoli until tender.
Serve the chicken with quinoa and broccoli.

name: Spicy Beef Tacos
directions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning until browned.
Warm tortillas in a pan.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and onions.
Serve hot.

name: Honey Mustard Chicken with Sweet Potatoes
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss chicken with honey mustard sauce and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Roast sweet potatoes and green beans with olive oil for 20 minutes.
Serve the chicken with roasted vegetables.

name: Grilled Pork Chops with Couscous
directions: Cook couscous as per package instructions.
Grill pork chops for 5-6 minutes per side.
Sauté zucchini and bell peppers in olive oil until tender.
Serve pork chops with couscous and vegetables.

name: Lamb Stew with Potatoes
directions: Brown lamb cubes in a pot.
Add vegetables and broth, then simmer for 1 hour.
Serve hot.

name: Baked Cod with Brown Rice
directions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Bake cod fillets with lemon slices and olive oil at 375°F for 15 minutes.
Sauté spinach until wilted.
Serve cod with rice and spinach.

name: Grilled Tuna Steak with Quinoa
directions: Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Grill tuna steaks for 3-4 minutes per side.
Grill asparagus until tender.
Serve tuna with quinoa and asparagus.

name: Vegetarian Chili with Rice
directions: Cook rice as per package instructions.
In a pot, sauté onions and bell peppers.
Add beans and tomatoes, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the chili over rice.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Lentils
directions: Cook lentils as per package instructions.
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Mix lentils with tomatoes, onions, and cumin.
Stuff the peppers and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
directions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir well.
Serve hot.

name: Bulgur Salad with Grilled Chicken
directions: Cook bulgur according to package instructions.
Grill chicken breasts and slice them.
Toss bulgur with cucumbers, tomatoes, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Serve with grilled chicken.

name: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables
directions: Cook quinoa as per package instructions.
Roast vegetables with olive oil at 400°F for 20 minutes.
Toss quinoa with roasted vegetables and balsamic vinegar.
Serve warm or cold.

name: Grilled salmon with sweet potatoes and asparagus
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with olive oil and salt.
Grill salmon for 5-7 minutes per side.
Peel and chop sweet potatoes, then roast at 400°F for 25 minutes.
Grill asparagus for 5-7 minutes.
Serve salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and grilled asparagus.

name: Chickpea vegetable curry with rice
directions: Cook rice as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté carrots and peas until tender.
Add chickpeas, spinach, and coconut milk.
Stir in curry powder and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve curry with rice.

name: Lentil bolognese with pasta and zucchini
directions: Cook pasta as per package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onion and zucchini.
Add lentils and crushed tomatoes, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the bolognese over pasta.
